geoQuery.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT d.ID, d.NOMENCLATURE "LABEL", d."XMIN", d."XMAX", d."YMIN", d."YMAX", d.WKB_GEOMETRY FROM WEB50.M_100_NOMENCLATURE_REF d WHERE d.NOMENCLATURE IN (SELECT NOMENCLATURE FROM WEB50.M_100_NOM_TO_SRV_DISTRICT)) d WHERE {FILTER} ORDER BY ID
